TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/SelectedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.SelectedIndexCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示包含 控件中选定项的索引的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection that contains the indexes to the selected items in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个存储中的选定项的索引控件。A stores the indexes to the selected items in a control. 中存储的索引是中的索引位置。The indexes stored in the are index positions within the . 将显示在所有项都存储控件。The stores all items displayed in the control. 下表显示了如何的示例中存储的项，并在示例中显示其选择状态。The following table shows an example of how the stores the items of the and shows their selection states in an example . |索引Index|项Item|在 ListView 中选择状态Selection state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-------------------------------------| |00|item1Item1|未选定Unselected| |11|item2Item2|已选定Selected| |22|item3Item3|未选定Unselected| |33|Item4Item4|已选定Selected| |44|Item5Item5|已选定Selected| 基于上表中的示例下, 表演示了如何将会显示。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ListViewItemCollection 中选定项的索引Index of selected item in the ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|----------------------------------------------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 可以使用的属性和此类的方法来执行各种任务的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法使您能够确定是否在索引位置从是存储在索引之一。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the is one of the indexes stored in the . 一旦您知道该项目已在集合中，可以使用方法来确定在索引位置。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the index in the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，并成员和类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and members and the class. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为对象`ListView1`和一个名为`TextBox1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a object named `ListView1` and a named `TextBox1`. 调用`InitializeListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 此示例需要该事件处理程序与正确关联事件。This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView1/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可确定中选定项的数量。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the . 然后，当循环访问集合的值并需要提供要执行循环的迭代次数时，可以使用此值。You can then use this value when you are looping through the values of the collection and need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 如果的属性设置为`false`，此属性返回 0 或 1，具体取决于是否选择了某项的值。If the property of the is set to `false`, this property returns a value of either 0 or 1 depending on whether an item is selected.
